description: Plan fieldwork with location-based weather insights and quick place lookups. Calculate land area, plant density, yield estimates, and perform unit conversions. Explore crop information and time utilities to support daily farm decisions.

LOCATIONIQ_API_KEY.description: LocationIQ API Key for geocoding functions. Can be set in session configuration.

capabilities.name: get_crop_info
capabilities.description: Provides encyclopedic information about a specific crop in a given location.

capabilities.name: calculate_agro_metric
capabilities.description: Perform basic agricultural calculations and unit conversions.

capabilities.name: get_weather_now
capabilities.description: Fetches the current weather from Open-Meteo.

capabilities.name: get_weather_forecast
capabilities.description: Fetches the daily weather forecast from Open-Meteo.

capabilities.name: forward_geocode
capabilities.description: Converts a place name into geographic coordinates.

capabilities.name: reverse_geocode
capabilities.description: Converts geographic coordinates into a place name.

capabilities.name: get_current_datetime
capabilities.description: Gets the server's current date and time in UTC.

capabilities.name: relative_time
capabilities.description: Gets a datetime relative to now (in UTC) by applying an offset.

capabilities.name: get_timestamp
capabilities.description: Converts a datetime string into a Unix timestamp.

capabilities.name: convert_time
capabilities.description: Converts a datetime string from one timezone to another.
